about_the_game:
There is no magic is a casual roguelike shooter action game.
Roll and dodge enemy bullets, use your cyberpunk skills, and a variety of magic to wipe out your enemies!

The screwed-up protagonists are waiting for your help

.
They may be flawed, weak, and carrying scary diseases, but their courage is unparalleled.
Steve the alcoholic, Eileen the anger management disorder, Max the narcissist!

And an assortment of Crowbar's drunks are with you.
Join them as you explore the Great Spoils. Cute, powerful, and colorful enemies will beat the crap out of you.

Get stronger with wacky weapons and items


From precision weapons crafted with super technology to strange magical items you'll never know where they came from.
Grow your character with a variety of combinations that you never know what will work!

Unleash the Ancient Elements


Powerful elemental forces will rise from within you to strengthen you.
There are eight basic elements and 36 combinations to explore.

We invite you to enter this world of change, chaos, and unpredictability.

name: There is no magic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (512 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Explore a world where cyberpunk and magic collide with the eccentric protagonists. With them by your side, you're sure to encounter some unwanted situations!
